programme.desc: Mission PAW: Royally Spooked! / Pups Save Monkey-Dinger - Another Mission PAW to Barkingburg! The Princess thinks she's seen a ghost, and the PAW Patrol needs to get to the bottom of it. // While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save the Royal Throne - Sweetie plans Sweetie plans to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Pups Save a Royal Concert / Mission PAW: Pups Save the Princess' Pals - Luke Stars goes missing before his Royal Concert in Barkingburg and Sweetie attempts to take over the Concert! // Animals are over running Barkingburg Castle while the Princess is away. It's up to Ryder and the Paw Patrol to get them under control!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep826
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hatch Day / Pups Save the Munchie Mobile - The Pups rescue Ace and her special delivery for Chickaletta's party. // The Pups rescue Mr. Porter and his stranded Food Truck.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save the Critters - Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day - Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay. // Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The PAW Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Shark / Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pier - In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away. // The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Frozen Flounder / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Narwhal - Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep503
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Sunken Sloop / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Wiggly Whale - Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down. // It's stuck in the sand at the bottom of the ocean, with Cap'n Turbot and Francois inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep509
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pirated Sea Patroller - The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save Tilly Turbot / Pups Save an Upset Elephant - The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep806
programme.desc: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer - Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - Paw Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger from Big Hairy, who uses him as a toy action figure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll - Paw Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger from Big Hairy, who uses him as a toy action figure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken - The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken - The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath and teach him a special song to help him learn how to brush his teeth.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum, so Duggee and the Squirrels need to do some detective work to reunite them with their real mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Flat and Steep - Kit and Pup are having a race. Can you see who is cycling on the flat path and who is cycling up the steep hill? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator work out how to get a ball to roll onto a target using a ramp.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep11
programme.desc: Unicorn - Dee encourages a friend to say 'unicorn' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see different types of unicorn - a white unicorn, a rainbow unicorn, a sparkly unicorn, and a fluffy unicorn!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep89
programme.desc: Swap Places - The Teletubbies swap places in the Tubby Car and drive to the Hidey Hup. They swap places again on the Tubby Uppy Downy before going up and down.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Radio Wol - The Iron Chicken's radio breaks down, so she and the Wols create their own radio station.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: The Thing That Talked - Bob and Gwen think they hear Tony talk for the first time, so they try to make him do it again.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: Float My Boat - A Blocker delivers a boat to Lake Street instead of the lake. Can Team Tinpo ship it back to where it belongs?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: Piggy Dreamer - When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: The Queen - Monty wonders whether the Queen has perfect manners all the time, or whether even royalty slip up now and then.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: My Best Best Bestest Friend - Lola and Lotta are best best friends. They do everything together. Then a new girl arrives at school, and Lotta seems rather taken with her.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky, Lucky Me! - Lola thinks she's the luckiest person in the whole world, especially when her grandparents send her and Charlie the money to go and see a new film.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Stick to the Trees - Nelly and Nora try to stick the Autumn leaves back on the trees.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: New River - It hasn't rained in ages, Nelly and Nora find a thirsty flower that needs water.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep36
programme.desc: Moon's Exhibition - A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep37
programme.desc: Pond Prose - Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep19
programme.desc: Don't Bother Victor - Peter Sam arrives at the depot after shunting coal trucks all night. Thomas is there waiting to take the Thin Controller to Knapford to meet with the Fat Controller.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Dog Loves Quests - Dog and Pug help Doris the Donkey on her quest to become a unicorn. She has to pass three tests if she wants to succeed. Doris finds out that she is much better staying as a donkey.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep37
programme.desc: Mars Mission, Chile - Xuli and Foz help NASA after a close encounter with a UFO makes them lose the Mars Rover.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep38
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Weather Prediction Predicament - There's a storm brewing after Glitch's fake weather report puts the cadets in danger.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Ria and Rohan's Indian Tandoori Chicken - Ria and Rohan show us how to cook their delicious version of a classic Indian dish, tandoori chicken, cooked in a traditional clay oven called a tandoor.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Kimmerosaurus & Clamshell - Andy heads back 160 million years in search of a prehistoric clamshell and plunges into the waters of the ancient ocean to meet some giant swimming reptiles.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep25
programme.desc: Leaky Landlubbers - The ship's mess is dangerously full and the tiniest drop could cause a messy disaster for Cook, Line and Captain Sinker.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Snow Joke - Captain Sinker is given a snow globe as a Christmas present from Cook and Line, but it's accidentally dropped into the Ship's Mess!

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Don't Forget To Remember - Flinders ties five ribbons on his tail to remind him of five things he needs to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Hotel - Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Bike - Bluey is struggling to learn how to ride her bike. But as she and Dad watch her friends determination with their own tasks, Bluey is inspired to give it another try.

programme.desc: Stick to the Trees - Nelly and Nora try to stick the Autumn leaves back on the trees.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: New River - It hasn't rained in ages, Nelly and Nora find a thirsty flower that needs water.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep36

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep37

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep19
programme.desc: Don't Bother Victor - Peter Sam arrives at the depot after shunting coal trucks all night. Thomas is there waiting to take the Thin Controller to Knapford to meet with the Fat Controller.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Dog Loves Quests - Dog and Pug help Doris the Donkey on her quest to become a unicorn. She has to pass three tests if she wants to succeed. Doris finds out that she is much better staying as a donkey.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.desc: Ria and Rohan's Indian Tandoori Chicken - Ria and Rohan show us how to cook their delicious version of a classic Indian dish, tandoori chicken, cooked in a traditional clay oven called a tandoor.

programme.desc: Kimmerosaurus & Clamshell - Andy heads back 160 million years in search of a prehistoric clamshell and plunges into the waters of the ancient ocean to meet some giant swimming reptiles.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep26
programme.desc: Snow Joke - Captain Sinker is given a snow globe as a Christmas present from Cook and Line, but it's accidentally dropped into the Ship's Mess!

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Don't Forget To Remember - Flinders ties five ribbons on his tail to remind him of five things he needs to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Bike - Bluey is struggling to learn how to ride her bike. But as she and Dad watch her friends determination with their own tasks, Bluey is inspired to give it another try.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath and teach him a special song to help him learn how to brush his teeth.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep2

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Boss Maybe / Family Bonding - Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter. // Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.desc: What's Love Gato Do With It? / Dial M. For Mustard - After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep74
programme.desc: Bummer Vacation / Wigstuck - Spongebob has never had a vacation. To save his job, Mr.Krabs gives him the day off! // Spongebob finds an old powdered wig in the trash and wears it thinking it's cool.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep75
programme.desc: Squidtastic Voyage / That's No Lady - When Squidward swallows his clarinet reed Sandy offers to retrieve the piece. // A misunderstanding over an advertisement causes Patrick to think he must "get out of town."

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep184
programme.desc: Jailbreak! - An imprisoned Plankton teams up with his fellow inmates to break out of jail and steal the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Nitwit Neighborhood News / The Patrick Show MidSeason Finale - Patrick and Squidina report the news around Bikini Bottom. // The Patrick Show presents the epic conclusion to the first half of its first season.

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep202
programme.desc: A Danger Among Us - After Miles has a vision that Rick Twitler is still around, Danger Force travels deep into the Man's Nest's to find him, running into an old foe along the way.

programme.title: Henry Danger S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Dream Busters - A villain’s 'dream beam' traps Henry in a crazy dream state that only Charlotte can rescue him from.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Lost & Found Part 1 - Exiled on a mining colony outside Federation space, a group of lawless teens discover a derelict Starfleet ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lost and Found Part 2 - Dal must gather an unlikely crew for their newfound ship if they are going to escape Tars Lamora, but The Diviner and his daughter Gwyn have other plans.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep135
programme.desc: Back to the Past / The Bad Guy Club for Villains - SpongeBob and Patrick go back in time to see the young Mermaidman and Barnacleboy. // SpongeBob and Patrick watch their heroes fight bad guys in a classic Mermaidman and Barnacleboy episode.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep136
programme.desc: A Day Without Tears / Summer Job - Squidward bets SpongeBob he can't go a day without crying. // Mrs. Puff has to work through her summer break at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cloud of the Month / A. Plumber - After receiving the Middlemost Post's 'Cloud of the Month' award, Parker gets a big head about the new title. // After clogging the toilet, Parker calls a plumber-that winds up being Ryan in disguise-to fix the problem.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep115
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Mail Off - Parker learns that the mail Drone the cloud accidentally destroyed has come back for revenge. Parker, Lily, and Mayor Peeve team up to stop the zombie mail Drone once and for all.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep106
programme.desc: How to Train Your Carl - Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Roadie to Nowhere / A Fridge Too Far - After learning that Chunk was like her in high school, Luna worries her ambition to be a rocker is unrealistic. // When food Lincoln has saved in the fridge gets taken, a territory war in the fridge ensues.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Selfie Improvement / No Place Like Homeschool - When Carol Pingrey's photo gets more likes on social media than Lori's she tries to one-up her. // Lola is being temporarily homeschooled. Thinking it looks like fun, the other kids try to get in on it.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep305
programme.desc: City Slickers / Fool Me Twice - Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. // The family has a new plan to dodge Luan's April Fool's Day pranking: stunt doubles

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Timmy the Barbarian / No Subsittute for Crazy - Binky's sick, so Jorgen shows up with some soup and a bedtime story to make him feel better. The story is 'Timmy the Barbarian'. // When Mr. Crocker falls off the classroom, Timmy wishes he had a new permanent teacher named Mrs. Sunshine.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Fairy Idol Part 1 - Norm the Genie is tired of granting everyone the same three wishes and instead wants to become a Fairy God Parent. But the only way to get the job is to trick Cosmo and Wanda into quitting so he can fill their vacant positions.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep68
programme.desc: Patrick Smartpants / Squidbob Tenaclepants - Patrick gets hit in the head and comes to with superior intellect! // Sandy accidentally melds Spongebob and Squidward into one body when her teleportation device malfunctions.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep69
programme.desc: Krusty Towers / Mrs. Puff, You're Fired - In another one of his money making schemes, Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into an upscale hotel. // Mrs. Puff gets fired when the higher ups learn of Spongebob's repeated failure.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep70
programme.desc: Chimps Ahoy / Ghost Host - Sandy is worried her inventions won't satisfy her chimp beneficiaries. // The Flying Dutchman crashes at SpongeBob's house where he constantly scares, startles and surprises SpongeBob.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep71
programme.desc: Whale of a Birthday / Karate Island - Mr. Krabs tries to throw his daughter, Pearl, the best birthday ever. // Spongebob competes on Karate Island for the title "King of Karate".

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Last Days of Summer / The Littlest Robot - Alvin wastes his entire summer playing a video game then tries to do all the fun things he'd planned in one day. // Simon invents a robot with emotions and an ability to learn which backfires when he's exposed to the internet.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: You Troll / Life of the Party - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments. // The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Lost in the Frost / An Eggcellent Adventure - Corn and Peg find a lost plushie doll on a ski trip and pledge to return it to its rightful owner. // After a flock of newborn ducklings wander away from their nest, it's up to Corn and Peg to bring them back safe and sound.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Beached Day / Welcome Baby Marissa - Corn and Peg bring Ferris to the beach, vowing to give him 'the best beach day ever!' // After the arrival of her baby sister, Clarissa feels like no one cares about her. Corn and Peg make it their mission to show Clarissa how special she is.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Insane in the Crane Game / Buhdeuce Goes Berserks - SwaySway and Buhdeuce become obsessed with winning a toy out of the new crane game that's been installed at Pumpers. // When Buhdeuce gets a bad haircut, he goes berserks, and now SwaySway has to calm his buddy down before he gets busted by Rambamboo

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Pictures of Boo - In need of shelter from a storm and desperately seeking sleep, the group of questers are welcomed into a mysterious house by a strange Colonel.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Dorg and the Pony Prance / Dorg and the Normhole - When Dorg and his sister go head-to-head a contest and a spell goes awry, he must choose - win a trophy or save his sister. // RD acts as the town mascot in exchange for the legendary Mall Pass, which grants VIP treatment at every store in the mall!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Catlantic City / Scaredy Cat - Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. // Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cup O' Universe / You're In Trouble - The kids discover a universe in a milkshake cup. // While at Tufflips overnight camp, the dudes do their best not to wet the bed.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Sushi Sitter / Cheer Beast - Captain Man must save Kid Danger from Drillfinger with the only tool he has: a motorized toilet. // Prepping for cheer tryouts, Piper tries out Captain Man's now-discontinued health program but when she turns into a beast the heroes must stop her.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Trading Day / The Hard Sell - In a moment of weakness, Fanboy agrees to trade Chum Chum for one of Yo's awesome toys. // Oz's mom insists he sell one of his beloved collectibles by day's end, or she will get rid of them all and turn his store into a yogurt shop.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Snapnapped / Mom-A-Geddon - Keswick is convinced by Snaptrap to build D.O.O.M. a new doomsday device, after he starts feeling that T.U.F.F. can't show empathy. // Dudley hasn't told his overprotective mother, Peg Puppy, that he is a T.U.F.F. super spy.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Queen for a Day - The Winx are determined to enter Cloudtower and lock the Legendarium. But plans are halted when Cloudtower becomes invisible! Meanwhile, Stella is queen for the day, but the power - and the Legendarium - have gone to her head.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Stella's Big Party - In an attempt to get her crown back from Darcy, Stella faces off with a Minotaur in an ancient Labyrinth. When she finally escapes the Legendarium World, she must return to Solaria to right the wrong she has done as Queen.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep105
programme.desc: I Think His Name is Baxter Stockman - When the Turtles sneak out against Splinter’s wishes (to go to a movie with April), they battle Baxter Stockman, a deranged inventor in mechanical battle armor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep167
programme.desc: The Krabby Patty That Ate Bikini Bottom / Bubble Buddy Returns - Mr. Krabs uses Sandy's experimental growth formula on a Krabby Patty and the results are disastrous! // While Bubble Buddy's son, Shiny, is visiting, SpongeBob tries desperately to keep him out of trouble and away from sharp edges.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Munk Vs Machine - The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete in a dodgeball tournament but no-one expects Theo to be their secret weapon.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Shack Magic - The Chipmunks find a shack that magically fills with toys and games, but is it magic or something more sinister?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Big Bro Theodore - When Theodore mistakenly thinks he's the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep101
programme.desc: First Delivery / Chore or Less - While delivering a letter to a house that never gets mail, the gang goes through warfare to get to its front door. // In an attempt to be more like Angus, Parker does the chores and realizes that they're actually boring.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Burt! The Musical / Sunday No FunDay - When Angus accidentally throws Burt away, he and Parker must get him back from Greenwood's Recycle King. // After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Cow Power / I.T. Pony - Annie and Pony adopt a cow to replace Dad's smoke belching truck, but when it doesn't work out, it's impossible to get rid of. // Annie thinks Pony is a tech genius, until his app creation puts the population in peril.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Family Free for All / Lucky Pony - When the Bramleys are picked to be contestants on a game show Annie worries that Pony's excitement will ruin their chance to be on TV. // Pony believes he's a good luck charm and the reason Annie's suddenly a track star.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep195
programme.desc: SpongeBob LongPants / Larry’s Gym - SpongeBob gets a pair of long pants, but they change his life in unexpected ways. // When Larry the Lobster opens a new gym in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob becomes his best customer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep196
programme.desc: The Fishbowl / Married to Money - Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick’s behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Plankton’s advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved…money!

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Squisery / Game Night - Patrick and Squidward must survive together in the woods after Squidward twists all of his ankles. // The adults sneak away to play a board game, but they have to hide from one camper in particular.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save a Tour Bus / Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control in Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A museum sleepover turns awry when Alex and the mini-patrol disappear, and Mayor Goodway gets stuck on a T-Rex!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Stop a Humdinger Horde / Mighty Pups Charged Up: Pups Save a Mighty Lighthouse - The Mighty Pups have to save the day when Harold makes a cloning machine! // Harold uses his super powers to turn Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse into a rocket! The Mighty Pups need to Charge Up and stop him!

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Smurfboards / Monkey See, Monkey Do - Vanity and Jokey start riding smurfboards around the village, but Brainy believes they're dangerous. // The Magic Supply Store mixes up Papa Smurf's and Gargamel's delivery orders, leaving Papa Smurf with a monkey!

programme.desc: Hidden Treasure/Bunny Ball Hockey - The Brave Bunnies meet a young TIGER named Garry in the Jungle. He puzzles over the treasure map his Dad drew for him.

programme.desc: Thermal Shock!/Primitive Activities/Cabin On Ice/Return Of The Beloved Being/The Bear Next Door/Wild Zapping/Warning: Unlimited Lemmings - Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show Ep5B/Ep218/Ep62/Ep140/Ep296/Ep170/Ep315
programme.desc: One of a Kind/Ghoul's Gold/Cheesy Ball Run/Live and Let Diet/Sock It To Me/Double Dog Trouble/Grumpelstiltskin - Detectives Tom and Jerry are hired by Polly the Dog.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep5B/Ep58B/Ep109B/Ep16A/Ep68B/Ep120A/Ep26A
programme.desc: The Game is a Foot/Wahder, Wahder, Everywhere/The Starship Mentalprise/Bugsfoot/The BreezeHammer/Bunny Man/Bugs Over Par - Shameless O'Scanty, a conniving, cloud-riding leprechaun, runs out of luck while riding his rainbow over Bugs' forest. Now he needs to gather some luck or he'll never get home.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep110/Ep140
programme.desc: First Snow/Night Visitor - Bop and Boo befriend Dwayne the MOOSE in the Snowy Forest. The Bunnies have never played in the snow before! Dwayne thinks they'll love it! But Boo knocks snow from a branch onto her head!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep10/Ep43
programme.desc: Teatime, Again And Again/A Very Magic Magic Wand - Wonderland is stuck in a time loop and only Alice and Lewis are aware of it! Teatime is a sacred moment, so having to repeat every 2 minutes can be very bothersome!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep210/Ep243
programme.desc: A Very Sleepy Tillie/Sofishticated Taste - It’s time for Tillie to take a nap, but she wants to keep playing with her Monstersitters.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep110/Ep143
programme.desc: Looking For Lost Memories/Super Willow - Sylvus loses his memory after getting hit on the head on accident. The Trio and Leafy must find a remedy for him, fast, and get him back to his normal self.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep110/Ep142
programme.desc: Dino Checkup Hiccup/This Ranch Ain’T Big Enough - After Clover accidentally breaks Min’s statoscope and tries to hide the evidence, he learns that he should never be afraid to tell Min when he makes a mistake.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep310/Ep343
programme.desc: Noisy Neighbours In Big Sky Park/Connect The Dots In Big Sky Park - Stomper's rehearsals for the “Yeti Yubaloo” cause trouble for some of the forest creatures.

programme.title: Mush Mush And The Mushables Ep107/Ep144
programme.desc: A Frog Of A Problem/Puff's Perfect Picnic - Mush-Mush’s favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere – nature will balance itself out.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? Ep1/Ep5
programme.desc: What a Night for a Dark Knight!/Peebles' Pet Shop of Terrible Terrors! - When Scooby and the gang come to Gotham City to visit Alfred Pennyworth they stumble into a dangerous mystery!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? Ep27/Ep32
programme.desc: The Horrible Haunted Hospital Of Dr. Phineas Phrag!/A Fashion Nightmare! - Scooby Doo and the gang meet up with actor and comedian Kristen Scaal.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? Ep11/Ep38
programme.desc: The Fastest Fast Food Fiend!/The Dreaded Remake Of Jekyll & Hyde! - Shaggy and Scooby compete in a Fast Food eating competition and meet their ultimate challenge in comedian Jim Gaffigan, who loves bacon as much as they do!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Laura Philipp - Being an Athlete and a Woman - Menstruation is still a taboo topic in sports, but ignoring the menstrual cycle can be dangerous for female athletes. 'There are a huge number of performances we wouldn’t see in the sports world if women did not suppress their bodies,' says Laura Philipp, one of the best triathletes on the planet. She aligns her training program with her cycle and is more successful than ever before.
